original_text: The Lord God of Israel says this: ‘If a man sends his wife away from him, I hate that! He has been cruel to his wife when he should take care of her. So be very careful! Remember your promise to take care of your wife.’
korean_text: 이스라엘의 하나님 여호와가 이르노니 나는 이혼하는 것과 옷으로 학대를 가리는 자를 미워하노라 만군의 여호와의 말이니라 그러므로 너희 심령을 삼가 지켜 거짓을 행하지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: The Lord God of Israel says this:
If a man sends his wife away from him,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 한 사람이 그의 아내를 자기에게서 쫓아내면,

sentences.original_text: He has been cruel to his wife
when he should take care of her.
Remember your promise to take care of your wife.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 아내를 돌보겠다는 너의 약속을 기억하라.
